Tool

NameResidual Analysis (Grid)
ID1
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2003
Specificationgrid

Description

Relations of each grid cell to its neighborhood. Wilson & Gallant (2000) used this type of calculation in terrain analysis. Reference: - Wilson, J.P., Gallant, J.C., [Eds.] (2000): 'Terrain analysis - principles and applications', New York, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
